messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

question regarding the decommissioning of tuesday july pm re vulnerabilities scans hi currently process moving git next step decommissioning process advise actual process thanks head mob tuesday july pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext thursday vulnerabilities scans hello please provide date change reference decommissioning looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext wednesday re vulnerabilities scans hi upgrade decommissioned thanks head mob pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advised received response ask back possible please keep mind issue resolved escalated looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext friday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advised waiting response regarding matter looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext wednesday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext friday pm re vulnerabilities scans please machine remote users thanks head mob friday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext friday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext wednesday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext friday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please advise looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext wednesday vulnerabilities scans hello please advised upgrades must made by machine owner require further assistance part please hesitate looking forward hearing once issues fixed thanks kind regards analyst ext tuesday pm re vulnerabilities scans please apply head mob wednesday pm vulnerabilities scans hello please update looking forward hearing thanks kind regards analyst ext thursday re vulnerabilities scans hi plan decommissioning activity log months thanks head mob pm vulnerabilities scans hello owner please advised exposing possible exploitable high severity vulnerabilities please organize patching issues fix presented client port type code id evaluated rating reported rating fix high critical upgrade version currently supported high critical upgrade version currently supported please let once fixes hesitate require assistance looking forward hearing thanks best regards analyst
